author: serenita_io
content:
I've talked to some of you about Vero last year but I'm sure most of you don't know it exists yet so posting here now that the Pectra-ready v1 is out.

Vero is a new multi-node validator client for Ethereum and Gnosis Chain. It combines data from multiple client implementations, only attesting to the latest state of the chain when there is consensus across them. This can help protect validators from ending up stuck on the wrong chain. Vero can protect validators from client bugs both on the CL and EL side.

https://serenita.io/blog/2025/vero-v1

If you're interested in how it compares to Vouch/DVT read the following docs page: https://github.com/serenita-org/vero/blob/master/docs/why_vero.md
